Author: gigi-has-issues
Text: I completely understand. It's like all my other goals hinge upon being thin (at least in my mind), so I can't actually do anything to move toward recovery because it'll fuck everything else up.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: There is a huge space between “thin” and “fat”, and for that matter between “miserable” and “happy”. It’s a space that’s worth exploring. What about slender and content. Fit and fulfilled. There is a whole cosmos of options.
